Web Support

The PW EMS is a graphical user interface (GUI) that presents key information through an intuitive point-and-click interface that is supported in web browsers such as Google Chrome™ or Mozilla FireFox®.

Through flexible, built-in dashboards, configuration and operational information for vBBU and vNodes is presented. Also, system alarm and event notifications and audit logs are presented graphically in the PW EMS web GUI.

Parent topic: Overview
